snippet: In his book, Tom Coughlin, who has led the Giants to two Super Bowl triumphs since becoming coach in 2004, outlines his principles for success in football, business and life.
abstract: In his book, Tom Coughlin, who has led the Giants to two Super Bowl triumphs since becoming coach in 2004, outlines his principles for success in football, business and life.

headline.main: Right to Win: Q. and A. With Tom Coughlin
